mapper.insert: insert into b_application_form (id, application_form_number, applicant_name, applicant_id, applicant_country, issue_date, issue_merchant_id, total_amount, customs_confirm_amount, status) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{applicationFormNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applicantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applicantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applicantCountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{issueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{issueMerchantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{customsConfirmAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, 1)
mapper.select: select sum(t.quantity * t.unit_price) customs_confirm_amount from ( select i.unit_price, i.quantity, i.status st, b.application_form_number from b_invoice b, b_item i where b.invoice_number = i.invoice_number ) t where t.application_form_number = #{applicationFormNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 1
